tests.title: should load the home page correctly
tests.fullTitle: Expense Tracker Tests should load the home page correctly
tests.code:
cy.contains('Expense Tracker'); // Check if the heading is present
cy.get('h1').should('have.text', 'Expense Tracker');

tests.title: should display wallet balance and expenses cards
tests.fullTitle: Expense Tracker Tests should display wallet balance and expenses cards
tests.code:
cy.contains('Wallet Balance'); // Check Wallet Balance card is present
cy.contains('Expenses'); // Check Expenses card is present

tests.title: should have a visible header with correct text
tests.fullTitle: Expense Tracker Tests should have a visible header with correct text
tests.code:
// Check if the header exists and contains the correct text
cy.get('h1').should('be.visible').and('have.text', 'Expense Tracker');

tests.title: should have a button to add income and it should be styled correctly
tests.fullTitle: Expense Tracker Tests should have a button to add income and it should be styled correctly

tests.fullTitle: Expense Tracker Tests should be responsive for mobile view
